pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, May 24, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, May 24, 2016:

Tokyo, Japan

8:30 a.m. JST The Prime Minister and Mrs. Grégoire Trudeau will visit the Meiji Shrine in Shibuya, Tokyo, Japan.

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage

9:45 a.m. JST The Prime Minister will meet with Mr. Yasuyuki Yoshinaga, President of Subaru.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

11:30 a.m. JST The Prime Minister will meet with Mr. Akio Toyoda, President and Chief Executive Officer of the Toyota Motor Corporation.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:30 p.m. JST The Prime Minister will meet with Mr. Takahiro Hachigo, President of Honda Motor Co., Ltd.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:00 p.m. JST The Prime Minister will participate in a Small Auto Parts Roundtable.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:40 p.m. JST The Prime Minister and Mrs. Grégoire Trudeau will have an audience with Their Majesties the Emperor and Empress of Japan.

Notes for media:

  • Restricted pooled photo opportunity

4:30 p.m. JST The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Hotel New Otani Tokyo
Japanese Garden

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage

6:00 p.m. JST The Prime Minister will attend the Official Welcoming Ceremony.

Grand Hall
Kantei

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage

6:15 p.m. JST The Prime Minister will meet with His Excellency Shinzo Abe, Prime Minister of Japan.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

7:25 p.m. JST The Prime Minister will deliver a joint statement with His Excellency Shinzo Abe, Prime Minister of Japan.

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage

8:00 p.m. JST The Prime Minister and Mrs. Grégoire Trudeau will attend a dinner given by the Prime Minister of Japan and Mrs. Akie Abe.

Closed to media.

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
